Posts.Content: Hi! I am 64 and had a 4.5mm tumour removed in May. Had not spread to lymph nodes. Started on tamoxifen in July. I had bad indigestion for the first three weeks but now it's fine. A few hot nights but now I don't notice anything. I'm hoping for another 20 years. Hope this helps.
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen for post menopausal women
